page.title: 19Living in Easton Village
page.content: {Easton}is a small,quiet village but has quite an active life. Although there are a great many old people there are younger people and families too ,as can be seen by the enthusiastic group who attend the thriving{Youth Club. There are no shops in Easton but food is delivered by stores in Winchester, there is a market garden and the Mobile Library comes twice a week. There is a{Cricket club,}a{Darts team and other activities organised by the church and Youth club. Many of the people who live there were born there and cannot imagine living anywhere else but there are newcomers who are also finding it a very pleasant place to live.
